title: The Unseen Editor: The Tale of Oscar Rogers
summary: Oscar Rogers discovers his ability to manipulate reality through editing video and plans to save his city from an impending disaster.
summaryGerman: Oscar Rogers entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, die Realität durch Videobearbeitung zu manipulieren und plant, seine Stadt vor einer bevorstehenden Katastrophe zu retten.
summaryDutch: Oscar Rogers ontdekt zijn vermogen om de realiteit te manipuleren door het bewerken van video en plant zijn stad te redden van een naderende ramp.
summaryFrench: Oscar Rogers découvre sa capacité à manipuler la réalité en éditant des vidéos et planifie de sauver sa ville d'une catastrophe imminente.

story.text: Oscar discovers he can change small elements of reality by editing videos of events around him.
Excited, Oscar tests his powers by averting a minor accident, editing the event's outcome before it occurs.
Realizing the potential, Oscar spends the day planning how to use his abilities for greater good.
A news report forecasts a terrible storm approaching; Oscar prepares to edit a crucial video.
He works tirelessly, editing multiple scenarios to divert the storm's path away from the city.
The storm is successfully redirected. The city celebrates, unaware of Oscar’s role in their salvation.
Oscar feels content, knowing his secret editing saved countless lives, committing to remain the unseen guardian.

ending: In the quiet of his editing room, Oscar Rogers smiled, his city safe once more.
moral: The greatest heroes are often the ones we never see.
